thread.title: Former New Jersey State Senator Jennifer Beck Joins Alliant

author: cnbc.com
title: Former New Jersey State Senator Jennifer Beck Joins Alliant
text:
Longtime public servant, business owner, and insurance advisor to provide insurance and risk management expertise to organizations across the Garden State
NEWPORT BEACH, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Alliant has added former New Jersey State Senator Jennifer Beck to its growing regional brokerage team. As Vice President, the longtime senator and entrepreneur will provide insurance and risk management services to a diverse array of organizations across the Garden State. Beck joins the firm’s Fair Haven, New Jersey-based Alliant/Boynton division.
“Jennifer joins our team with a lifetime of service and an intimate understanding of the unique dynamics affecting New Jersey’s residents and economy,” said Bob Bennetsen, Executive Vice President and Senior Managing Director with Alliant. “Her far-reaching expertise as a public servant, business owner, and insurance advisor will serve as a powerful addition to our team and a significant benefit to our clients.”
Beck joins Alliant following a 10-year career as a New Jersey State Senator, most recently representing the 11 th District, which includes Monmouth County. During her time in office, she championed legislation promoting pensions and benefits reform, small business growth, and economic revitalization.
Beck is licensed in property and casualty insurance and employee benefits, and also served as president of JAB Marketing, a firm she founded to provide marketing, public relations, and promotional support to businesses throughout New Jersey.
As part of Alliant/Boynton, Beck will leverage her depth of regional expertise and strong business acumen to provide property and casualty and employee benefits solutions to clients across a broad range of industries and disciplines.
A graduate of Boston College, Beck is a trustee with the Monmouth Conservation Foundation and board member of the Affordable Housing Allegiance, Affiliated Physicians and Employers Health Plan, and Red Bank Woman’s Club.
Beck will be based in the Fair Haven, NJ office of Alliant. She can be reached at (732) 784-9783 or at Jennifer.Beck@alliant.com .
About Alliant Insurance Services
Headquartered in Newport Beach, CA, Alliant Insurance Services, Inc. provides property and casualty, workers’ compensation, employee benefits, surety, and financial products and services to clients nationwide, including public entities, tribal nations, healthcare, energy, law firms, real estate, construction, and other industry groups. More information is available on the company’s website at www.alliant.com .
